46 typedef struct xref_t {
47  char const *mode;
48  int mmal_mode;
49 } XREF_T;

53 static XREF_T exposure_map[] = {
54  {"off", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_OFF},
55  {"auto", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_AUTO},
56  {"night", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_NIGHT},
57  {"nightpreview", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_NIGHTPREVIEW},
58  {"backlight", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_BACKLIGHT},
59  {"spotlight", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_SPOTLIGHT},
60  {"sports", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_SPORTS},
61  {"snow", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_SNOW},
62  {"beach", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_BEACH},
63  {"verylong", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_VERYLONG},
64  {"fixedfps", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_FIXEDFPS},
65  {"antishake", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_ANTISHAKE},
66  {"fireworks", MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_FIREWORKS}};

69  sizeof(exposure_map) / sizeof(exposure_map[0]);

122 #define CommandSharpness 0
123 #define CommandContrast 1
124 #define CommandBrightness 2
125 #define CommandSaturation 3
126 #define CommandISO 4
127 #define CommandVideoStab 5
128 #define CommandEVComp 6
129 #define CommandExposure 7
130 #define CommandAWB 8
131 #define CommandImageFX 9
132 #define CommandColourFX 10
133 #define CommandMeterMode 11
134 #define CommandRotation 12
135 #define CommandHFlip 13
136 #define CommandVFlip 14
137 #define CommandROI 15

139 static COMMAND_LIST cmdline_commands[] = {
140  {CommandSharpness, "-sharpness", "sh", "Set image sharpness (-100 to 100)",
141  1},
142  {CommandContrast, "-contrast", "co", "Set image contrast (-100 to 100)", 1},
143  {CommandBrightness, "-brightness", "br", "Set image brightness (0 to 100)",
144  1},
145  {CommandSaturation, "-saturation", "sa",
146  "Set image saturation (-100 to 100)", 1},
147  {CommandISO, "-ISO", "ISO", "Set capture ISO", 1},
148  {CommandVideoStab, "-vstab", "vs", "Turn on video stablisation", 0},
149  {CommandEVComp, "-ev", "ev", "Set EV compensation", 1},
150  {CommandExposure, "-exposure", "ex", "Set exposure mode (see Notes)", 1},
151  {CommandAWB, "-awb", "awb", "Set AWB mode (see Notes)", 1},
152  {CommandImageFX, "-imxfx", "ifx", "Set image effect (see Notes)", 1},
153  {CommandColourFX, "-colfx", "cfx", "Set colour effect (U:V)", 1},
154  {CommandMeterMode, "-metering", "mm", "Set metering mode (see Notes)", 1},
155  {CommandRotation, "-rotation", "rot", "Set image rotation (0-359)", 1},
156  {CommandHFlip, "-hflip", "hf", "Set horizontal flip", 0},
157  {CommandVFlip, "-vflip", "vf", "Set vertical flip", 0},
158  {CommandROI, "-roi", "roi",
159  "Set region of interest (x,y,w,d as normalised coordinates [0.0-1.0])",
160  1}};
161 
162 static int cmdline_commands_size =
163  sizeof(cmdline_commands) / sizeof(cmdline_commands[0]);
164 
165 #define parameter_reset -99999
166 
174 static int update_cycle_parameter(int *option, int min, int max,
175  int increment) {
176  vcos_assert(option);
177  if (!option) return 0;
178 
179  if (*option == parameter_reset) *option = min - increment;
180 
181  *option += increment;
182 
183  if (*option > max) {
184  *option = parameter_reset;
185  return 0;
186  } else
187  return 1;
188 }
189 
202 int raspicamcontrol_cycle_test(MMAL_COMPONENT_T *camera) {
203  static int parameter = 0;
204  static int parameter_option =
205  parameter_reset; // which value the parameter currently has
206 
207  vcos_assert(camera);
208 
209  // We are going to cycle through all the relevant entries in the parameter
210  // block and send options to the camera.
211  if (parameter == 0) {
212  // sharpness
213  if (update_cycle_parameter(&parameter_option, -100, 100, 10))
214  raspicamcontrol_set_sharpness(camera, parameter_option);
215  else {
216  raspicamcontrol_set_sharpness(camera, 0);
217  parameter++;
218  }
219  } else if (parameter == 1) {
220  // contrast
221  if (update_cycle_parameter(&parameter_option, -100, 100, 10))
222  raspicamcontrol_set_contrast(camera, parameter_option);
223  else {
224  raspicamcontrol_set_contrast(camera, 0);
225  parameter++;
226  }
227  } else if (parameter == 2) {
228  // brightness
229  if (update_cycle_parameter(&parameter_option, 0, 100, 10))
230  raspicamcontrol_set_brightness(camera, parameter_option);
231  else {
232  raspicamcontrol_set_brightness(camera, 50);
233  parameter++;
234  }
235  } else if (parameter == 3) {
236  // contrast
237  if (update_cycle_parameter(&parameter_option, -100, 100, 10))
238  raspicamcontrol_set_saturation(camera, parameter_option);
239  else {
240  parameter++;
241  raspicamcontrol_set_saturation(camera, 0);
242  }
243  } else if (parameter == 4) {
244  // EV
245  if (update_cycle_parameter(&parameter_option, -10, 10, 4))
246  raspicamcontrol_set_exposure_compensation(camera, parameter_option);
247  else {
248  raspicamcontrol_set_exposure_compensation(camera, 0);
249  parameter++;
250  }
251  } else if (parameter == 5) {
252  // MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_T
253  if (update_cycle_parameter(&parameter_option, 0, exposure_map_size, 1))
254  raspicamcontrol_set_exposure_mode(
255  camera,
256  (MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_T)exposure_map[parameter_option]
257  .mmal_mode);
258  else {
259  raspicamcontrol_set_exposure_mode(camera,
260  MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_AUTO);
261  parameter++;
262  }
263  } else if (parameter == 6) {
264  // MMAL_PARAM_AWB_T
265  if (update_cycle_parameter(&parameter_option, 0, awb_map_size, 1))
266  raspicamcontrol_set_awb_mode(
267  camera,
268  (MMAL_PARAM_AWBMODE_T)awb_map[parameter_option].mmal_mode);
269  else {
270  raspicamcontrol_set_awb_mode(camera, MMAL_PARAM_AWBMODE_AUTO);
271  parameter++;
272  }
273  }
274  if (parameter == 7) {
275  // MMAL_PARAM_IMAGEFX_T
276  if (update_cycle_parameter(&parameter_option, 0, imagefx_map_size, 1))
277  raspicamcontrol_set_imageFX(
278  camera,
279  (MMAL_PARAM_IMAGEFX_T)imagefx_map[parameter_option].mmal_mode);
280  else {
281  raspicamcontrol_set_imageFX(camera, MMAL_PARAM_IMAGEFX_NONE);
282  parameter++;
283  }
284  }
285  if (parameter == 8) {
286  MMAL_PARAM_COLOURFX_T colfx = {0, 0, 0};
287  switch (parameter_option) {
288  case parameter_reset:
289  parameter_option = 1;
290  colfx.u = 128;
291  colfx.v = 128;
292  break;
293  case 1:
294  parameter_option = 2;
295  colfx.u = 100;
296  colfx.v = 200;
297  break;
298  case 2:
299  parameter_option = parameter_reset;
300  colfx.enable = 0;
301  parameter++;
302  break;
303  }
304  raspicamcontrol_set_colourFX(camera, &colfx);
305  }
306 
307  // Orientation
308  if (parameter == 9) {
309  switch (parameter_option) {
310  case parameter_reset:
311  raspicamcontrol_set_rotation(camera, 90);
312  parameter_option = 1;
313  break;
314 
315  case 1:
316  raspicamcontrol_set_rotation(camera, 180);
317  parameter_option = 2;
318  break;
319 
320  case 2:
321  raspicamcontrol_set_rotation(camera, 270);
322  parameter_option = 3;
323  break;
324 
325  case 3: {
326  raspicamcontrol_set_rotation(camera, 0);
327  raspicamcontrol_set_flips(camera, 1, 0);
328  parameter_option = 4;
329  break;
330  }
331  case 4: {
332  raspicamcontrol_set_flips(camera, 0, 1);
333  parameter_option = 5;
334  break;
335  }
336  case 5: {
337  raspicamcontrol_set_flips(camera, 1, 1);
338  parameter_option = 6;
339  break;
340  }
341  case 6: {
342  raspicamcontrol_set_flips(camera, 0, 0);
343  parameter_option = parameter_reset;
344  parameter++;
345  break;
346  }
347  }
348  }
349 
350  if (parameter == 10) {
351  parameter = 1;
352  return 0;
353  }
354 
355  return 1;
356 }
357 
365 static int map_xref(const char *str, const XREF_T *map, int num_refs) {
366  int i;
367 
368  for (i = 0; i < num_refs; i++) {
369  if (!strcasecmp(str, map[i].mode)) {
370  return map[i].mmal_mode;
371  }
372  }
373  return -1;
374 }
375 
383 static const char *unmap_xref(const int en, XREF_T *map, int num_refs) {
384  int i;
385 
386  for (i = 0; i < num_refs; i++) {
387  if (en == map[i].mmal_mode) {
388  return map[i].mode;
389  }
390  }
391  return NULL;
392 }
393 
400 /*static*/ MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_T exposure_mode_from_string(
401  const char *str) {
402  int i = map_xref(str, exposure_map, exposure_map_size);
403 
404  if (i != -1) return (MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_T)i;
405 
406  vcos_log_error("Unknown exposure mode: %s", str);
407  return MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_AUTO;
408 }
409 
416 /*static*/ MMAL_PARAM_AWBMODE_T awb_mode_from_string(const char *str) {
417  int i = map_xref(str, awb_map, awb_map_size);
418 
419  if (i != -1) return (MMAL_PARAM_AWBMODE_T)i;
420 
421  vcos_log_error("Unknown awb mode: %s", str);
422  return MMAL_PARAM_AWBMODE_AUTO;
423 }
424 
431 MMAL_PARAM_IMAGEFX_T imagefx_mode_from_string(const char *str) {
432  int i = map_xref(str, imagefx_map, imagefx_map_size);
433 
434  if (i != -1) return (MMAL_PARAM_IMAGEFX_T)i;
435 
436  vcos_log_error("Unknown image fx: %s", str);
437  return MMAL_PARAM_IMAGEFX_NONE;
438 }
439 
446 static MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMETERINGMODE_T metering_mode_from_string(
447  const char *str) {
448  int i = map_xref(str, metering_mode_map, metering_mode_map_size);
449 
450  if (i != -1) return (MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMETERINGMODE_T)i;
451 
452  vcos_log_error("Unknown metering mode: %s", str);
453  return MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMETERINGMODE_AVERAGE;
454 }
455 
462 int raspicamcontrol_parse_cmdline(RASPICAM_CAMERA_PARAMETERS *params,
463  const char *arg1, const char *arg2) {
464  int command_id, used = 0, num_parameters;
465 
466  if (!arg1) return 0;
467 
468  command_id = raspicli_get_command_id(
469  cmdline_commands, cmdline_commands_size, arg1, &num_parameters);
470 
471  // If invalid command, or we are missing a parameter, drop out
472  if (command_id == -1 ||
473  (command_id != -1 && num_parameters > 0 && arg2 == NULL))
474  return 0;
475 
476  switch (command_id) {
477  case CommandSharpness: // sharpness - needs single number parameter
478  sscanf(arg2, "%d", &params->sharpness);
479  used = 2;
480  break;
481 
482  case CommandContrast: // contrast - needs single number parameter
483  sscanf(arg2, "%d", &params->contrast);
484  used = 2;
485  break;
486 
487  case CommandBrightness: // brightness - needs single number parameter
488  sscanf(arg2, "%d", &params->brightness);
489  used = 2;
490  break;
491 
492  case CommandSaturation: // saturation - needs single number parameter
493  sscanf(arg2, "%d", &params->saturation);
494  used = 2;
495  break;
496 
497  case CommandISO: // ISO - needs single number parameter
498  sscanf(arg2, "%d", &params->ISO);
499  used = 2;
500  break;
501 
502  case CommandVideoStab: // video stabilisation - if here, its on
503  params->videoStabilisation = 1;
504  used = 1;
505  break;
506 
507  case CommandEVComp: // EV - needs single number parameter
508  sscanf(arg2, "%d", &params->exposureCompensation);
509  used = 2;
510  break;
511 
512  case CommandExposure: // exposure mode - needs string
513  params->exposureMode = exposure_mode_from_string(arg2);
514  used = 2;
515  break;
516 
517  case CommandAWB: // AWB mode - needs single number parameter
518  params->awbMode = awb_mode_from_string(arg2);
519  used = 2;
520  break;
521 
522  case CommandImageFX: // Image FX - needs string
523  params->imageEffect = imagefx_mode_from_string(arg2);
524  used = 2;
525  break;
526 
527  case CommandColourFX: // Colour FX - needs string "u:v"
528  sscanf(arg2, "%d:%d", &params->colourEffects.u,
529  &params->colourEffects.u);
530  params->colourEffects.enable = 1;
531  used = 2;
532  break;
533 
534  case CommandMeterMode:
535  params->exposureMeterMode = metering_mode_from_string(arg2);
536  used = 2;
537  break;
538 
539  case CommandRotation: // Rotation - degree
540  sscanf(arg2, "%d", &params->rotation);
541  used = 2;
542  break;
543 
544  case CommandHFlip:
545  params->hflip = 1;
546  used = 1;
547  break;
548 
549  case CommandVFlip:
550  params->vflip = 1;
551  used = 1;
552  break;
553 
554  case CommandROI: {
555  double x, y, w, h;
556  int args;
557 
558  args = sscanf(arg2, "%lf,%lf,%lf,%lf", &x, &y, &w, &h);
559 
560  if (args != 4 || x > 1.0 || y > 1.0 || w > 1.0 || h > 1.0) {
561  return 0;
562  }
563 
564  // Make sure we stay within bounds
565  if (x + w > 1.0) w = 1 - x;
566 
567  if (y + h > 1.0) h = 1 - y;
568 
569  params->roi.x = x;
570  params->roi.y = y;
571  params->roi.w = w;
572  params->roi.h = h;
573 
574  used = 2;
575  break;
576  }
577  }
578 
579  return used;
580 }
581 
585 void raspicamcontrol_display_help() {
586  int i;
587 
588  fprintf(stderr, "\nImage parameter commands\n\n");
589 
590  raspicli_display_help(cmdline_commands, cmdline_commands_size);
591 
592  fprintf(stderr, "\n\nNotes\n\nExposure mode options :\n%s",
593  exposure_map[0].mode);
594 
595  for (i = 1; i < exposure_map_size; i++) {
596  fprintf(stderr, ",%s", exposure_map[i].mode);
597  }
598 
599  fprintf(stderr, "\n\nAWB mode options :\n%s", awb_map[0].mode);
600 
601  for (i = 1; i < awb_map_size; i++) {
602  fprintf(stderr, ",%s", awb_map[i].mode);
603  }
604 
605  fprintf(stderr, "\n\nImage Effect mode options :\n%s", imagefx_map[0].mode);
606 
607  for (i = 1; i < imagefx_map_size; i++) {
608  fprintf(stderr, ",%s", imagefx_map[i].mode);
609  }
610 
611  fprintf(stderr, "\n\nMetering Mode options :\n%s",
612  metering_mode_map[0].mode);
613 
614  for (i = 1; i < metering_mode_map_size; i++) {
615  fprintf(stderr, ",%s", metering_mode_map[i].mode);
616  }
617 
618  fprintf(stderr, "\n");
619 }
620 
627 void raspicamcontrol_dump_parameters(const RASPICAM_CAMERA_PARAMETERS *params) {
628  const char *exp_mode =
629  unmap_xref(params->exposureMode, exposure_map, exposure_map_size);
630  const char *awb_mode = unmap_xref(params->awbMode, awb_map, awb_map_size);
631  const char *image_effect =
632  unmap_xref(params->imageEffect, imagefx_map, imagefx_map_size);
633  const char *metering_mode = unmap_xref(
634  params->exposureMeterMode, metering_mode_map, metering_mode_map_size);
635 
636  fprintf(stderr, "Sharpness %d, Contrast %d, Brightness %d\n",
637  params->sharpness, params->contrast, params->brightness);
638  fprintf(stderr,
639  "Saturation %d, ISO %d, Video Stabilisation %s, Exposure "
640  "compensation %d\n",
641  params->saturation, params->ISO,
642  params->videoStabilisation ? "Yes" : "No",
643  params->exposureCompensation);
644  fprintf(stderr, "Exposure Mode '%s', AWB Mode '%s', Image Effect '%s'\n",
645  exp_mode, awb_mode, image_effect);
646  fprintf(
647  stderr,
648  "Metering Mode '%s', Colour Effect Enabled %s with U = %d, V = %d\n",
649  metering_mode, params->colourEffects.enable ? "Yes" : "No",
650  params->colourEffects.u, params->colourEffects.v);
651  fprintf(stderr, "Rotation %d, hflip %s, vflip %s\n", params->rotation,
652  params->hflip ? "Yes" : "No", params->vflip ? "Yes" : "No");
653  fprintf(stderr, "ROI x %lf, y %f, w %f h %f\n", params->roi.x,
654  params->roi.y, params->roi.w, params->roi.h);
655 }
656 
664 int mmal_status_to_int(MMAL_STATUS_T status) {
665  if (status == MMAL_SUCCESS)
666  return 0;
667  else {
668  switch (status) {
669  case MMAL_ENOMEM:
670  vcos_log_error("Out of memory");
671  break;
672  case MMAL_ENOSPC:
673  vcos_log_error("Out of resources (other than memory)");
674  break;
675  case MMAL_EINVAL:
676  vcos_log_error("Argument is invalid");
677  break;
678  case MMAL_ENOSYS:
679  vcos_log_error("Function not implemented");
680  break;
681  case MMAL_ENOENT:
682  vcos_log_error("No such file or directory");
683  break;
684  case MMAL_ENXIO:
685  vcos_log_error("No such device or address");
686  break;
687  case MMAL_EIO:
688  vcos_log_error("I/O error");
689  break;
690  case MMAL_ESPIPE:
691  vcos_log_error("Illegal seek");
692  break;
693  case MMAL_ECORRUPT:
694  vcos_log_error("Data is corrupt \attention FIXME: not POSIX");
695  break;
696  case MMAL_ENOTREADY:
697  vcos_log_error(
698  "Component is not ready \attention FIXME: not POSIX");
699  break;
700  case MMAL_ECONFIG:
701  vcos_log_error(
702  "Component is not configured \attention FIXME: not POSIX");
703  break;
704  case MMAL_EISCONN:
705  vcos_log_error("Port is already connected ");
706  break;
707  case MMAL_ENOTCONN:
708  vcos_log_error("Port is disconnected");
709  break;
710  case MMAL_EAGAIN:
711  vcos_log_error(
712  "Resource temporarily unavailable. Try again later");
713  break;
714  case MMAL_EFAULT:
715  vcos_log_error("Bad address");
716  break;
717  default:
718  vcos_log_error("Unknown status error");
719  break;
720  }
721 
722  return 1;
723  }
724 }
725 
730 void raspicamcontrol_set_defaults(RASPICAM_CAMERA_PARAMETERS *params) {
731  vcos_assert(params);
732 
733  params->sharpness = 0;
734  params->contrast = 0;
735  params->brightness = 50;
736  params->saturation = 0;
737  params->ISO = 400;
738  params->videoStabilisation = 0;
739  params->exposureCompensation = 0;
740  params->exposureMode = MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMODE_AUTO;
741  params->exposureMeterMode = MMAL_PARAM_EXPOSUREMETERINGMODE_AVERAGE;
742  params->awbMode = MMAL_PARAM_AWBMODE_AUTO;
743  // params->imageEffect = MMAL_PARAM_IMAGEFX_SATURATION;
744  params->imageEffect = MMAL_PARAM_IMAGEFX_NONE;
745  params->colourEffects.enable = 0;
746  params->colourEffects.u = 128;
747  params->colourEffects.v = 128;
748  params->rotation = 0;
749  params->hflip = params->vflip = 0;
750  params->roi.x = params->roi.y = 0.0;
751  params->roi.w = params->roi.h = 1.0;
752  params->shutter_speed = 0; // automatic
753 }
754 
761 int raspicamcontrol_get_all_parameters(MMAL_COMPONENT_T *camera,
762  RASPICAM_CAMERA_PARAMETERS *params) {
763  vcos_assert(camera);
764  vcos_assert(params);
765 
766  if (!camera || !params) return 1;
767 
768  /* TODO : Write these get functions
769  params->sharpness = raspicamcontrol_get_sharpness(camera);
770  params->contrast = raspicamcontrol_get_contrast(camera);
771  params->brightness = raspicamcontrol_get_brightness(camera);
772  params->saturation = raspicamcontrol_get_saturation(camera);
773  params->ISO = raspicamcontrol_get_ISO(camera);
774  params->videoStabilisation =
775  raspicamcontrol_get_video_stabilisation(camera);
776  params->exposureCompensation =
777  raspicamcontrol_get_exposure_compensation(camera); params->exposureMode =
778  raspicamcontrol_get_exposure_mode(camera); params->awbMode =
779  raspicamcontrol_get_awb_mode(camera); params->imageEffect =
780  raspicamcontrol_get_image_effect(camera); params->colourEffects =
781  raspicamcontrol_get_colour_effect(camera); params->thumbnailConfig =
782  raspicamcontrol_get_thumbnail_config(camera);
783  */
784  return 0;
785 }
786 
793 int raspicamcontrol_set_all_parameters(
794  MMAL_COMPONENT_T *camera, const RASPICAM_CAMERA_PARAMETERS *params) {
795  int result;
796 
797  result = raspicamcontrol_set_saturation(camera, params->saturation);
798  result += raspicamcontrol_set_sharpness(camera, params->sharpness);
799  result += raspicamcontrol_set_contrast(camera, params->contrast);
800  result += raspicamcontrol_set_brightness(camera, params->brightness);
801  result += raspicamcontrol_set_ISO(camera, params->ISO);
802  result += raspicamcontrol_set_video_stabilisation(
803  camera, params->videoStabilisation);
804  result += raspicamcontrol_set_exposure_compensation(
805  camera, params->exposureCompensation);
806  result += raspicamcontrol_set_exposure_mode(camera, params->exposureMode);
807  result +=
808  raspicamcontrol_set_metering_mode(camera, params->exposureMeterMode);
809  result += raspicamcontrol_set_awb_mode(camera, params->awbMode);
810  result += raspicamcontrol_set_imageFX(camera, params->imageEffect);
811  result += raspicamcontrol_set_colourFX(camera, &params->colourEffects);
812  // result += raspicamcontrol_set_thumbnail_parameters(camera,
813  // &params->thumbnailConfig); TODO Not working for some reason
814  result += raspicamcontrol_set_rotation(camera, params->rotation);
815  result += raspicamcontrol_set_flips(camera, params->hflip, params->vflip);
816  result += raspicamcontrol_set_ROI(camera, params->roi);
817  result += raspicamcontrol_set_shutter_speed(camera, params->shutter_speed);
818  return result;
819 }
820 
827 int raspicamcontrol_set_saturation(MMAL_COMPONENT_T *camera, int saturation) {
828  int ret = 0;
829 
830  if (!camera) return 1;
831 
832  if (saturation >= -100 && saturation <= 100) {
833  MMAL_RATIONAL_T value = {saturation, 100};
834  ret = mmal_status_to_int(mmal_port_parameter_set_rational(
835  camera->control, MMAL_PARAMETER_SATURATION, value));
836  } else {
837  vcos_log_error("Invalid saturation value");
838  ret = 1;
839  }
840 
841  return ret;
842 }
843

850  int ret = 0;

855  MMAL_RATIONAL_T value = {sharpness, 100};
856  ret = mmal_status_to_int(mmal_port_parameter_set_rational(
857  camera->control, MMAL_PARAMETER_SHARPNESS, value));
858  } else {
859  vcos_log_error("Invalid sharpness value");
860  ret = 1;
861  }
862 
863  return ret;
864 }

1085  const MMAL_PARAM_COLOURFX_T *colourFX) {

1106 int raspicamcontrol_set_rotation(MMAL_COMPONENT_T *camera, int rotation) {
1107  int ret;
1108  int my_rotation = ((rotation % 360) / 90) * 90;
1109 
1110  ret = mmal_port_parameter_set_int32(camera->output[0],
1111  MMAL_PARAMETER_ROTATION, my_rotation);
1112  mmal_port_parameter_set_int32(camera->output[1], MMAL_PARAMETER_ROTATION,
1113  my_rotation);
1114  mmal_port_parameter_set_int32(camera->output[2], MMAL_PARAMETER_ROTATION,
1115  my_rotation);
1116 
1117  return ret;
1118 }
1119 
1128 int raspicamcontrol_set_flips(MMAL_COMPONENT_T *camera, int hflip, int vflip) {
1129  MMAL_PARAMETER_MIRROR_T mirror = {
1130  {MMAL_PARAMETER_MIRROR, sizeof(MMAL_PARAMETER_MIRROR_T)},
1131  MMAL_PARAM_MIRROR_NONE};
1132 
1133  if (hflip && vflip)
1134  mirror.value = MMAL_PARAM_MIRROR_BOTH;
1135  else if (hflip)
1136  mirror.value = MMAL_PARAM_MIRROR_HORIZONTAL;
1137  else if (vflip)
1138  mirror.value = MMAL_PARAM_MIRROR_VERTICAL;
1139 
1140  mmal_port_parameter_set(camera->output[0], &mirror.hdr);
1141  mmal_port_parameter_set(camera->output[1], &mirror.hdr);
1142  return mmal_port_parameter_set(camera->output[2], &mirror.hdr);
1143 }
1144 
1152 int raspicamcontrol_set_ROI(MMAL_COMPONENT_T *camera, PARAM_FLOAT_RECT_T rect) {
1153  MMAL_PARAMETER_INPUT_CROP_T crop = {
1154  {MMAL_PARAMETER_INPUT_CROP, sizeof(MMAL_PARAMETER_INPUT_CROP_T)}};
1155 
1156  crop.rect.x = (65536 * rect.x);
1157  crop.rect.y = (65536 * rect.y);
1158  crop.rect.width = (65536 * rect.w);
1159  crop.rect.height = (65536 * rect.h);
1160 
1161  return mmal_port_parameter_set(camera->control, &crop.hdr);
1162 }

1213 void raspicamcontrol_check_configuration(int min_gpu_mem) {
1214  int gpu_mem = 256; // raspicamcontrol_get_mem_gpu();
1215  int supported = 1, detected = 1;
1216  // raspicamcontrol_get_camera(&supported, &detected);
1217  if (!supported)
1218  vcos_log_error(
1219  "Camera is not enabled in this build. Try running \"sudo "
1220  "raspi-config\" and ensure that \"camera\" has been enabled\n");
1221  else if (gpu_mem < min_gpu_mem)
1222  vcos_log_error(
1223  "Only %dM of gpu_mem is configured. Try running \"sudo "
1224  "raspi-config\" and ensure that \"memory_split\" has a value of %d "
1225  "or greater\n",
1226  gpu_mem, min_gpu_mem);
1227  else if (!detected)
1228  vcos_log_error(
1229  "Camera is not detected. Please check carefully the camera module "
1230  "is installed correctly\n");
1231  else
1232  vcos_log_error(
1233  "Failed to run camera app. Please check for firmware updates\n");
1234 }
